item.title: Large (Java) Applications on Apache OpenWhisk
item.description: This blog post will explain how to run large Java applications on Apache OpenWhisk. Java actions are deployed from JAR files containing application class files. External libraries can be used by bundling those dependencies into a fat JAR file. The JAR file must be less than the maximum action size of 48MB. So, what if the application uses lots of external libraries and the JAR file is larger than 48MB?
